1.title: Humse Na Ho Paayega
1.plot: Balan and Aashna arrive at their new home to an overly friendly and enthusiastic Rohan but also the not-so-welcoming Akash and Veer. This move is tough on both the sides. As they try to adjust to each other's drastically contrasting lifestyles, a few rules and agreements need to be worked out. Both parties go all-out negotiating and hilarity ensues.

2.title: Khan-Daan
2.plot: Balan and Aashna fight the bachelors for TV time. Will they succeed in watching the film that they want to watch or will the boys pose unusual problems?

3.title: Safari-Squad
3.plot: Balan and Aashna must unite with the unkempt bachelors to fight a common enemy - the not-so-friendly neighbourhood mouse. Will they succeed in their battle?

4.title: Family Ban Gayi (Diwali Episode)
4.plot: Things hit a rocky patch when a fight breaks out amongst friends. Veer and Akash end up having a quarrel while Aashna and Balan end up in a massive argument. Will Rohan be able to play peacemaker and bring the family together on Diwali?

imdb.plot outline: '2by3' tells the story of a married couple, Balan and Aashna, who are both in their early 30s and are well settled into their 'adulthood'. However, due to a temporary financial crunch, they are forced to move in with three, 20-year-old college roommates, Rohan, Veer and Akash - all three of whom are trying to wriggle around life without having to really grow up. The series is about finding comfort where none exists; it is a "coming of age" story meeting a "coming down in age" story.
imdb.title: 2by3
plot: '_2by3_ (qv)' tells the story of a married couple, Balan and Aashna, who are both in their early 30s and are well settled into their 'adulthood'. However, due to a temporary financial crunch, they are forced to move in with three, 20-year-old college roommates, Rohan, Veer and Akash - all three of whom are trying to wriggle around life without having to really grow up. The series is about finding comfort where none exists; it is a "coming of age" story meeting a "coming down in age" story.::Dice Media
